00021 #include "eol_types.h"

00042 typedef struct
00043 {
00044   eolLine  name;  /*name of the input*/
00045   eolWord  type;  /*input type: key, button, axis*/
00046   eolUint  id;      /*which key or axis or button*/
00047   eolFloat value;    /*current state of the input*/
00048   eolFloat oldvalue; /*last state of the input*/
00049   eolUint  timePress; /*this time index*/
00050   eolUint  lastPress; /*time index of the last time this input was pressed*/
00051 }eolInput;
